name: InterventionPreferencesAtEndOfLifeLOINC
title: Intervention Preferences at End of Life LOINC
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes concepts representing an individual's intervention preferences at end of life which can be expressed by the individual in his or her advance care plan.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this value set is to identify personal intervention preferences that may be relevant and could be considered by clinicians when making a treatment/care plan for the person.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include intervention preferences that would be held by the individual (but may also be held by the clinician).),(Exclusion Criteria: Do not include intervention preferences that only would be held by a clinician caring for the patient.)
